places.name: Succulent Tacos
places.address: 900 Rosa L Parks Blvd, Nashville, TN 37208
places.summary: Plant-based tacos, esquites (creamy Mexican corn), and Mexican sodas.

places.name: AVO
places.summary: Creative whole-foods menu with many raw and cooked, globally inspired dishes in a container village setting.

places.name: Woodlands Indian Vegetarian Restaurant
places.summary: Large lineup of vegan options at a classic Indian spot. Don’t miss the pakoras.

places.name: Graze
places.summary: Spicy hot tempeh sandwich, nachos supreme, salads, and more—something for everyone.

places.name: Sunflower Café
places.summary: Cheery café with burgers, wraps, bowls, nachos; soy- and gluten-free friendly.

places.name: Grins Vegetarian Cafe
places.summary: Nashville’s oldest vegetarian (and kosher) restaurant on Vanderbilt’s campus. Loved for house-made sandwiches, soups, and cookies.

places.name: Vegelicious
places.summary: Comfort-food favorites like Po’Boys, gyros, lasagna, and more.

places.name: Guerrilla Bizkits
places.summary: Punk-rock biscuit spot with three signature biscuit flavors—great solo or as breakfast sandwiches.

places.name: E + Rose Wellness Café
places.summary: Chic juice bar for toast, superfood smoothies, and smoothie bowls. Menus vary by location.
places.notes: Check specific location menus before visiting.
